review: Love this thing so much. Part of my cord cutting plan. They have great range, even with my poor excuse for a WAP (Wireless Access Point).With PLEX, HULU, NETFLIX all available, it is perfect. The only thing missing is AMAZON PRIME : ( !!!! soon i hope.I actually bought two of these guys. Setup is a breeze.
author: Bradley

review: i thought this thing displayed what you see on your computer screen. It only works with apps that support chromecast. Like utube.
